name: get_all_brands
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool iherb_product_data_api.
Tool description: Query for products using many filters! Filter by price, review, discount percentage, if has stock, etc! Or export a .zip file with all updated products!
API description: Fetches all available brands from the iHerb Product Data API for a given page number.

page.description: The page number to retrieve brands from.
